entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kejimkujik (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kejimkujik Park 7:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
